text: Little Murders is a 1971 American black comedy movie. It is directed by and stars Alan Arkin. The movie is based on the play by Jules Feiffer. Other actors include Elliott Gould, Marcia Rodd, Doris Roberts, Alan Arkin, Vincent Gardenia, and Donald Sutherland. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1971 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies
title: Little Murders
